attributes.action: Bring forward the referendum vote on Europe to the beginning of next year
attributes.background: Bring forward the vote on Europe so people can have their say on whether they want to stay as part of Europe or not

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104838

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
